body_html: Yes, Tensorflow 1.7 can be built against CUDA 9.1 and CuDNN 7.1.2 if you have 1-2 hours per each try and don't want automated builds (e.g. for Docker). Here's how to do it, dear Tensorflow team.
body_text: Yes, Tensorflow 1.7 can be built against CUDA 9.1 and CuDNN 7.1.2 if you have 1-2 hours per each try and don't want automated builds (e.g. for Docker). Here's how to do it, dear Tensorflow team.
body: Yes, Tensorflow 1.7 can be built against CUDA 9.1 and CuDNN 7.1.2 if you have 1-2 hours per each try and don't want automated builds (e.g. for Docker). [Here's how to do it](http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/), dear Tensorflow team.
